name: Honeycomb: Word Puzzle
description:
Honeycomb is our word puzzle that we've been working on over the past year. You must fill in each puzzle by using all available letters to form valid words. This can be quite tricky on a hex grid though!

Web demo here: https://honeycomb.goodgameshelf.com

The demo version includes ~50 levels and 2/3 of the Daily Challenge levels. The full versions are live on Google Play and Apple App Store via the links below.
